Jacob Getlar Smith (1898 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1958) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme ihe osise nke na-arụkarị ọrụ na New York City. Smith gụrụ akwụkwọ na National Academy of Design na New York site na 1919 ruo 1921.
N'afọ 1929, e nyere Smith Guggenheim Fellowship n'ọhịa nka márá mmá, màkà ọrụ okike na eserese.

E gosipụtara ihe osise Smith n'ọtụtụ gallery, gụnyere Midtown Galleries, New York; National Academy of Design; Art Institute of Chicago; Corcoran Gallery of Art; Pennsylvania Academy of Fine Arts; John Herron Art Institute; Fort Wayne Art Museum; Carnegie Institute; Brooklyn Museum; Minneapolis Institute of Arts; Ann Arbor Art Association; Rochester Memorial Art Gallery; Cincinnati Gallery of Toronto; National Gallery of Canada (Ottawa); Des Moines City Association of Fine Arts.
N'afọ 1930, e nyèrè Smith Maazị na Oriakụ
Logan Prize nke narị asaa na iri ise dollar màkà ihe osise ya, Friends, site na Kọmitii na-ese ihe na ihe ọkpụkpụ nke Art Institute of Chicago.
Ọ nwụrụ na Montefiore Hospital na The Bronx, New York n'ubochí irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1958.
Smith bụ ónyé édémédé ma ọ bụ ónyé nchịkọta akwụkwọ na isiokwu gbasara eserese, gụnyere:
